sys_script_client.description:
displayes error message when the priority field is changed to 1 and the state feedback is set to "Awaiting Feedback" beforehand,
note : this is only executed when the priority field is changed, setting the state to "Awaiting Feedback" when the priority is already set to 1 wont display the error message, to achieve this, a similar script must be added to the state field.
sys_script_client.name: ClientScriptOnChange1
